name: B. Counting Rhombi
statement:
You have two positive integers and . Your task is to count the number of
rhombi which have the following properties: Have positive area. With
vertices at integer points. All vertices of the rhombi are located
inside or on the border of the rectangle with vertices at points , , , .
In other words, for all vertices of the rhombus the following conditions
should fulfill: and . Its diagonals are parallel to the axis. Count the
number of such rhombi.Let us remind you that a is a quadrilateral whose
four sides all have the same length.
